name: Maxine Hall Health Center
description: The Maxine Hall Health Center provides primary care health services for all ages, including a Primary Care Clinic, Women's Clinic and a Walk-In Clinic Services available without an appointment: - Nurse Advice Hotline - Primary Care Behavioral Health - Behavioral Health Assistants Services by appointment only: - Primary Care - Prenatal Care - Nurse Clinic - Women’s Clinic - Podiatry - Pharmacy - Nutrition - Mammo Van (mammogram) every 2nd Tuesday of the Month
